name: Aliothin/SearchX
description: The Ultimate Telegram Bot for Google Drive

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot token, Get it from @Botfather

OWNER_ID.description: An integer of consisting of your owner ID

DRIVE_FOLDER_ID.description: your google drive folder id for uploads

TELEGRAPH_ACCS.description: Choose how many telegraph tokens will be generated (Default is 2)

AUTHORIZED_CHATS.description: Fill the user_id and/or chat_id you want to authorize, separate them with space

DATABASE_URL.description: Create a cluster on MongoDB to get this value

IS_TEAM_DRIVE.description: Set to True if the DRIVE_FOLDER_ID is from a Shared Drive

USE_SERVICE_ACCOUNTS.description: Set to True if the data will be cloned using Service Accounts.

DRIVE_INDEX_URL.description:
Refer to maple's GDIndex or Bhadoo's Google Drive Index
Note: The Index URL should not have any trailing '/'

TOKEN_JSON_URL.description: Fill the direct download link of token.json file

ACCOUNTS_ZIP_URL.description: Archive the accounts folder to a zip file. Then fill the direct download link of that file.

DRIVE_LIST_URL.description: Upload the drive_list file on GitHub Gist. Now open the raw link of that gist and remove commit id from the link. Then fill the var with that link.

UNIFIED_EMAIL.description: Fill the email address of Unified accounts

UNIFIED_PASSWORD.description: Fill the password of Unified account
